DataElement.preferredName: Patient T1 Stage Finding Present Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator related to the patient having a clinical and/or pathologic primary tumor TNM finding indicating that the cancer is limited to the site of growth.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A clinical and/or pathologic primary tumor TNM finding indicating that the cancer is limited to the site of growth._Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: A clinical and/or pathologic primary tumor TNM finding indicating that the cancer is limited to the site of growth.:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: A clinical and/or pathologic primary tumor TNM finding indicating that the cancer is limited to the site of growth.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 1/29/2020: CM Released as part of draft content review

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
